items.question: How secure is your platform?
items.answer: We use bank-grade 256-bit encryption, are PCI DSS compliant, and undergo regular third-party security audits. Your financial data is stored in secure, redundant data centers with 24/7 monitoring.

items.question: Can I switch plans anytime?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges or credits automatically.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), bank transfers, and digital wallets. For Enterprise plans, we can arrange custom payment terms.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all Professional features. No credit card required to start.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied for any reason, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.
